titles.title: International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace Authorization Act of 2015
To seek the establishment of and contributions to an International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
3/19/2015--Introduced. International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace Authorization Act of 2015
Urges the President to make every effort, in conjunction with the government of Israel, the Palestinian Authority, and the international community to establish an International Fund for Israeli-Palestinian Peace.
Authorizes appropriations for U.S. contributions to the Fund.
